publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-912 Mike Rumbles: British Heart Foundation "How Big is Your Heart" Campaign-That the Parliament notes that, despite substantial progress, coronary heart disease remains one of Scotland's biggest killers, causing too many Scots to die prematurely each year; congratulates the British Heart Foundation on its "How Big is Your Heart" Valentine's Day campaign and particularly for the success it has had in raising funds to carry out much-needed research for the fight against heart disease in Scotland; believes that campaigns such as these provide an ideal opportunity to raise public awareness about the nature and extent of the disease, and urges MSPs and members of the public to support the "How Big is Your Heart" campaign.

S2M-912 Mike Rumbles: British Heart Foundation "How Big is Your Heart" Campaign-That the Parliament notes that, despite substantial progress, coronary heart disease remains one of Scotland's biggest killers, causing too many Scots to die prematurely each year; congratulates the British Heart Foundation on its "How Big is Your Heart" Valentine's Day campaign and particularly for the success it has had in raising funds to carry out much-needed research for the fight against heart disease in Scotland; believes that campaigns such as these provide an ideal opportunity to raise public awareness about the nature and extent of the disease, and urges MSPs and members of the public to support the "How Big is Your Heart" campaign. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-912 British Heart Foundation "How Big is Your Heart" Campaign (lodged on 12 February 2004) Christine Grahame*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Margaret Smith*, Robert Brown*, Robin Harper*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Fiona Hyslop*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Elaine Smith*, Helen Eadie*, Bruce Crawford*, Jeremy Purvis*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-912 British Heart Foundation "How Big is Your Heart" Campaign (lodged on 12 February 2004) Jackie Baillie*, Kate Maclean*, Margaret Jamieson*, Colin Fox*, Donald Gorrie*
